b:CheckBox.text: You have uploaded the wrong DUC. Please use the DUC template for ROSMAP/AMP-AD provided in this request tool.
Please upload every page of the DUC.
Please fully execute your DUC including a signing official.
You may not act as your own signing official. Please have someone at your institution who can attest to your affiliation and good standing sign your DUC.

The data requestor(s) you are requesting access for must match the data requestor(s) on your signed DUC. Please ensure that everyone on the DUC is listed as a data requester with their own Synapse ID.
Please put the name of your project lead in the appropriate field.
Please put the full name of your institution in the appropriate field.

Please add more information to your Intended Data Use statement. Your Intended Data Use statement should be 1-3 paragraphs address the following points: What do you want to do? Why are you doing it? How do you want to do it?

Please submit an ethics/IRB approval letter that indicates approval for you to use the METABRIC/OsloVal dataset. Your letter must mention the METRABRIC/OsloVal dataset by name. If your approval letter does not mention the dataset by name, please combine your submitted research protocol or proposal and the approval letter into one document and upload.
